text: ` ` Last Man Standing'' and star Tim Allen return on Fox Thursday ( 8 EDT / PDT ) a year after being canceled by ABC. ( Photo : Richard Foreman Jr. SMPSP, ) The fall season is always a special time for TV fans, with the return of series favorites and the premiere of new shows that could become the next big thing. Prepare yourselves of the coming onslaught with our handy premiere calendar.
